Title: Relates to enacting the "New York State Transparency in Supply Chains Act"
Summary: Establishes the "New York state transparency in supply chains act" which requires businesses to fully disclose efforts being taken to eliminate human trafficking within the supply chain process and provide those disclosures to consumers.
LawCode: Add ยง399-mm, Gen Bus L; add ยง220, Tax L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law and the tax law, in relation to enacting the "New York State Transparency in Supply Chains Act", and to require businesses within the state to disclose their preventative measures against human trafficking
